item.title: manjaro installation guide
item.description: 20180214 update: 第一个版本已经比较久了，于是更新一下，顺便写了个脚本orz pacman-mirrors -c China echo " [archlinuxcn] " >> /etc/pacman.conf echo " SigLevel = Optional TrustedOnly " >> /etc/pacman.conf echo " Server = https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/archlinuxcn/\$arch" >> /etc/pacman.conf echo "[arch4edu]" >> /etc/pacman.conf echo "SigLevel = Never" >> /etc/pacman.conf echo "Server = http://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/arch4edu/\$arch " >> /etc/pacman.conf pacman -Syyu pacman -S archlinuxcn-keyring pacman -S yakuake fish gvim pacman -S google-chrome chromium pacman -S wget aria2 remarkable netease-cloud-music pacman -S fcitx fcitx-configtool fcitx-sogoupinyin fcitx-im kcm-fcitx pacman -S shadowsocks-qt5 pacman -S wqy-microhei wqy-microhei-lite wqy-bitmapfont wqy-zenhei ttf-arphic-ukai ttf-arphic-uming adobe-source-han-sans-cn-fonts cat >> ~/.
